features.name: Authentication
features.description: JWT-based authentication with login page and route guards. Handles token storage and authorization headers for API requests.

features.name: Bible Voices Management
features.description: View and manage Bible translation voices. Displays list of voices with translation info and allows toggling voice active status.

features.name: Bible Anomalies
features.description: View, filter, and manage voice anomalies with pagination. Supports filtering by anomaly type, book, status, and sorting. Allows updating anomaly status and creating new anomalies.

features.name: Bible Inspect
features.description: Inspect Bible chapters with audio alignment. View verses with timing data and audio playback.

features.name: Alignment Tasks
features.description: Manage MFA (Montreal Forced Aligner) alignment tasks. Create, view, update, and delete alignment tasks with file uploads.

features.name: Timing Correction
features.description: Manual timing correction for audio-text alignment with waveform visualization.

features.name: Audio Playback
features.description: Audio player component with playback controls and verse-level audio segment playback.

features.name: API Services
features.description: Axios-based API services for Bible API and Alignment API. Handles translations, languages, books, voices, anomalies, and alignment tasks.

features.name: Base Layout
features.description: Main application layout with sidebar navigation and content area.

features.name: Welcome Page
features.description: Landing page displayed after login with dashboard overview.
